should_auto_repair.label: Auto Repair
should_auto_repair.tooltip: Enable or disable automatic self-repair of gear.

auto_repair_threshold.label: Auto Repair Threshold
auto_repair_threshold.tooltip: Set the durability percentage threshold to trigger auto-repair.

should_auto_extract_materia.label: Auto Extract Materia
should_auto_extract_materia.tooltip: Enable or disable automatic extraction of materia from gear.
